StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthEval]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileID uniqueidentifier
AS
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT et.ID, etg.Designa.on AS GroupDesig, etg.Title AS GroupTitle, etg.Reference AS GroupRef, et.Designa.on, et.Title, et.Reference, et.FirstMonthValue, et.SecondMonthValue, et.ThirdMonthValue, et.DateCer..ed, et.NCOICSignatureID, U1.FirstName SNCOICFirstName, U1.MiddleName SNCOICMiddleName, U1.LastName SNCOICLastName, et.RecruiterSignatureID, U2.FirstName RecruiterFirstName, U2.MiddleName RecruiterMiddleName, U2.LastName RecruiterLastName, et.RISignatureID, U3.FirstName RIFirstName, U3.MiddleName RIMiddleName, U3.LastName RILastName, (SELECT ReviewBy FROM USMC.MonthEvalua.on WHERE Mul.MonthEvalua.onId= me.ID AND MonthIncrement=(LEFT(e.Name,1))) as ReviewBy1, (SELECT ReviewBy FROM USMC.MonthEvalua.on WHERE Mul.MonthEvalua.onId= me.ID AND MonthIncrement=(RIGHT(LEFT(e.Name,3),1))) as ReviewBy2, (SELECT ReviewBy FROM USMC.MonthEvalua.on WHERE Mul.MonthEvalua.onId= me.ID AND MonthIncrement=(RIGHT(LEFT(e.Name,5),1))) as ReviewBy3 FROM USMC.Evalua.onTask et JOIN USMC.Evalua.onTaskGroup AS etg ON etg.ID = et.Evalua.onTaskGroupID JOIN USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on AS me ON me.ID = et.Mul.MonthEvalua.onId JOIN USMC.TrainingFile AS . ON ..ID = me.TrainingFileID JOIN USMC.Evalua.onType AS e ON e.ID = me.Evalua.onTypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U1 ON U1.UserID = et.NCOICSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U2 ON U2.UserID = et.RecruiterSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U3 ON U3.UserID = et.RISignatureID WHERE ..ID=@TrainingFileID ORDER BY GroupDesig, et.Designa.on
END
